param.name: title
param.label: Title %s
param.description: Optionally input the title to display as this list title.

param.name: description
param.label: Description
param.description: Optionally input the description to describe this lists purpose.

param.name: published
param.label: Publish
param.description: Select the publish state of this list.

param.name: default
param.label: Default
param.description: Select the default state of this list. Note the default list should have the lowest Access Level (recommended Public).

param.name: viewaccesslevel
param.label: Access Level
param.description: Select the view access level for this list. Only users which are in groups assigned to this view access level will see this list.

param.name: usergroupids
param.label: Usergroups
param.description: Select the usergroups to include in this list. Only users which are in the selected groups will be displayed.

params.name: sort_basic
params.description: Select field and direction for user list sorting.

param.name: sort_advanced
param.description: Input a valid sql ORDER BY statement using u. to prefix user table columns (e.g., u.`username` ASC, u.`email` DESC) and ue. to prefix comprofiler table columns (e.g., ue.`cb_city` DESC, ue.`cb_country` ASC). Example: u.`username` ASC, u.`email` DESC, ue.`cb_city` DESC, ue.`cb_country` ASC

params.name: filter_basic
params.description: Specify field, operator and comparison value for user list filtering. CB field substitutions are supported.

param.name: filter_advanced
param.description: Input a valid sql WHERE statement using u. to prefix user table columns (e.g., u.`username`, u.`email`) and ue. to prefix comprofiler table columns (e.g., ue.`cb_city`, ue.`cb_country`). CB field substitutions are supported. Example: (u.`username` <> 'admin' AND u.`email` NOT LIKE '%gmail.com') OR (ue.`cb_country` <> 'U.S.A')

param.name: title
param.label: Title
param.description: Enter title to be displayed for this column.

param.name: size
param.label: Size
param.description: Select bootstrap column size. Total bootstrap column count is 12 so if you want to have a 4 column user list you should set this to 3 for each column.

param.name: cssclass
param.label: CSS Class
param.description: CSS class name to be added to this column.

params.name: fields
params.description: Select field and display mode pairs for this column.

tabpanetab.name: search
tabpanetab.label: Search
tabpanetab.description: Users-lists can be searchable by multiple criteria, according to settings below, and the 'searchable' attribute of the listed fields.

param.name: list_search
param.label: Searchable fields
param.description: Whether this list has user-searchable fields

param.name: list_search_fields
param.label: Fields to search
param.description: Select the searchable fields to display for searching.

param.name: list_compare_types
param.label: Search crieteria
param.description: If users should be able to choose the type of comparison to be made (only standard 'is' and ranges can be optimized in mysql with proper indexes).

param.name: list_search_empty
param.label: Hide Empty Searches
param.description: Whether a list should hide the results of an empty search. This will result in List All and no search criteria results hiding the results and showing the search criteria only.

param.name: list_search_collapse
param.label: Collapse Search Criteria
param.description: Whether a list should collapse the search criteria after making a search. This will result in the criteria being hidden after each search and can be expanded again by clicking Search Users.

param.name: list_show_selector
param.label: Show List Selector
param.description: Whether this list shows userlist selector or not. Default is yes.

param.name: list_show_in_selector
param.label: Show in List Selector
param.description: Whether this list shows in the userlist selector or not. Default is yes.

param.name: list_show_blocked
param.label: Show Blocked
param.description: Whether this list shows blocked users or not. Note only moderators can access these users profile. Default is no.

param.name: list_show_banned
param.label: Show Banned
param.description: Whether this list shows banned users or not. Note only moderators can access these users profile. Default is yes.

param.name: list_show_unapproved
param.label: Show Unapproved
param.description: Whether this list shows unapproved users or not. Note only moderators can access these users profile. Default is no.

param.name: list_show_unconfirmed
param.label: Show Unconfirmed
param.description: Whether this list shows unconfirmed users or not. Note only moderators can access these users profile. Default is no.

param.name: list_grid_layout
param.label: Use Grid Layout
param.description: Whether this list should show as a grid of users or a list of users. Note this only works for div based output. Default is no.

param.name: list_grid_height
param.label: Grid Height
param.description: The height of a users grid box. If left blank none will be applied and pure CSS solutions can be used.

param.name: list_grid_width
param.label: Grid Width
param.description: The width of a users grid box. If left blank none will be applied and pure CSS solutions can be used.

param.name: list_limit
param.label: Number of entries per page
param.description: Number of users appearing per page. Leave empty for no limit. Default is 30.

param.name: list_paging
param.label: Show pagination
param.description: Whether this list shows links for paging or just displays entries from first page. Default is yes.

param.name: allow_profilelink
param.label: Allow Link to Profile
param.description: Select 'Yes' to allow each row to link to the related users profile and 'No' to prevent profile links on lists. Default is yes.

param.name: hotlink_protection
param.label: Hot-linking protection for this users-list
param.description: Whether you want the links to the pages and searches in this list to not be permanent (we add a parameter which is valid for a few hours to all urls except first page and check it), so that except first page it's not hotlinkable and there are no permanent links on paging and on search criteria. Default is NO.

param.name: hotlink_warning
param.label: WARNING
param.default: Setting hot-linking protection to 'Yes' will prevent all pages from this list (if everybody has allowed access to it), except first page of list, to be bookmarkable and indexable by slow-pace search bots and search engines such as google, making the user profiles not indexed in search engines (if they are publicly accessible). This may be desirable in some cases, but removes all users-pages from the search-engines indexing, except for the users of the first page.
